room_title: Escape room "The Crimson Storm" by Puzzle Effect Clovis in Clovis
review: Great, creative, fun! 6 of us did Crimson Storm and it was challenging and really cool!

room_title: Escape room "The Crimson Storm" by Puzzle Effect Clovis in Clovis
review: This room was ranked at the top of my list. It was set up great, you had to really apply your brain to figure out the clues.

room_title: Escape room "The Crimson Storm" by Puzzle Effect Clovis in Clovis
review: There were 4 of us and we had an awesome time! I highly recommend this place and we will definitely be coming back for more! The facilities were very clean, the staff was friendly, and the room itself was nicely planned. In comparison, it has been the best space I have visited so far.

room_title: Escape room "The Crimson Storm" by Puzzle Effect Clovis in Clovis
review: Went here for my birthday with my husband and my mom. Staff was very friendly and helpful and the place was easy to find. The room itself was awesome and the riddles were just challenging enough to be hard but fun. Definitely going back.

room_title: Escape room "The Crimson Storm" by Puzzle Effect Clovis in Clovis
review: My wife and I went to Fresno Escape Room with another couple and did the pirate room. The employees were incredibly welcoming and friendly from the moment we walked in. They explained the rules well and started us off. The room itself was very thematic and well done. We felt immersed in the scenario right from the beginning. The puzzles were really well thought-out; they weren't overly difficult, but you still got a big sense of satisfaction when you solved them.
